revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Buffalo |model=WHR-HP-GN |revision= |upc=747464120232 |ean= |asin=B002WBV37Y |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=07/20/2009 |manuf_country=China |manuf=Cameo |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id=FDI-09101567-0 |ic_id=6102A-024 |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Atheros |cpu1_model=AR7240 |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=4 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25L3205DMI-12G |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=Mira |ram1_model=P3S56D40ETP-G5 |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial=yes,, (115200,8,N,1) |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR9283 |wi1_chip2_brand= |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=RP-SMA |wi1_txchains=1 |wi1_rxchains=1 |wi1_sstreams=1 |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu=true |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags= |tp_firmware=DD-WRT |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=0024A5XXXXXX |default_ssid_regex=^0024A5[A-F0-9]{6}$ |default_ip=192.168.11.1 |default_user=root |default_pass= |oui=00:24:A5 |oui_eth=00:24:A5 |default_ch= }} [https://c85091.ssl.cf0.rackcdn.com/WHR-HP-GN_man.pdf Manual]
The device is presumed to be manufactured by '''Cameo'''.
[http://net.it168.com/a2010/1231/1145/000001145147_all.shtml Review of the device on '''it186.com'''] (decent photos) :This device appears to be using the same board (and 2T2R capable WiFi IC [AR9283]) as the [[Buffalo WHR-HP-G300N]].. despite being a single-stream (and single antenna) device. [http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?p=534754 On the DD-WRT forums] (internal shot) [https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?id=23243 '''''Buffalo WHR-HP-GN / WHR-HP-G300N''''' on the '''OpenWrt Forums'''] :Serial settings are 115200, 8, N, 1
Default login credentials and the IP is per '''Buffalo''''s manual.
The default SSID for the device appears to be the MAC address (no delimiters, upper case hex letters).
